alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:38PM EDT until March 29 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Madison, Jefferson and Taylor Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 52.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 53.3 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.3 feet on 12/07/1976. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.
